doc:
Petra Martínez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petra_Mart%C3%ADnez 0 Petra Martínez Pérez (b. 24 June 1944) is a Spanish actress who has a long career on stage, film and television.She was in the cast of the 1967 stage play Twelfth Night, by William Shakespeare.In 2011, Uroc Teatro, founded by Petra Martínez and Juan Margallo, received the Medalla de Oro al Mérito en las Bellas Artes. In 2012 she was nominated to Premio Luna de Islantilla for Best Actress at Festival Internacional de Cine Bajo la Luna Islantilla Cinefórum for the film Libre directo.From 2014 she appears in the TV series La que se avecina.In 2017 she received the Premio Jiennenses de Cultura, given by Diario Jaén. On March 18, 2017 she was awarded to Premio de San Pancracio de Honor at Festival Solidario de Cine Español de Cáceres alongside the actors Roberto Álamo, Laia Marull, Carlos Santos, Ana Castillo, and directores Koldo Serra and Salvador Calvo and the stage designer Marcelo Pacheco.On the same year she created an Instagram account because she was usurped so many times. Petra_Martínez_Pérez ( b._24_June_1944 ) is a_Spanish_actress who has a_long_career on stage_,_film_and_television.She was in the_cast of the_1967_stage_play_Twelfth_Night , by William_Shakespeare.In_2011 , Uroc_Teatro , founded by Petra_Martínez and Juan_Margallo , received the_Medalla de Oro_al_Mérito en las_Bellas_Artes . In 2012 she was_nominated to Premio_Luna de Islantilla for Best_Actress at Festival_Internacional de Cine_Bajo_la_Luna_Islantilla_Cinefórum for the_film_Libre_directo.From_2014 she appears in the_TV_series_La_que_se_avecina.In 2017 she received the_Premio_Jiennenses de Cultura , given by Diario_Jaén . On March_18_,_2017 she was_awarded to Premio de San_Pancracio de Honor at Festival_Solidario de Cine_Español de Cáceres alongside the_actors_Roberto_Álamo , Laia_Marull , Carlos_Santos , Ana_Castillo , and directores Koldo_Serra and Salvador_Calvo and the_stage_designer_Marcelo_Pacheco.On the_same_year she created an_Instagram_account because she was_usurped so_many_times .
